p: The use and presence of earthworms may increase the effectiveness of growing OP, as they can contribute to soil turnover, structure formation and serve as a fertility enhancer (Sabrina, Hanafi, Azwady, & Mahmud, 2009). They have been recommended to improve crop health and suppress diseases in general (Elmer, Street, Box, & Haven, 2012). This biological factor should not be overlooked as a means to combat the effects of CC.
